org.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM users INNER JOIN friends ON users.id = friends.friend_user_id INNER JOIN users AS befriendees_friends ON befriendees_friends.id = friends.friend_user_id WHERE friends.user_id = "$1" AND users.status IN ("$2", "$3") LIMIT 1

rewrites.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM users INNER JOIN friends ON users.id = friends.friend_user_id WHERE friends.user_id = "$1" AND users.status IN ("$2", "$3") LIMIT 1
